content:
Sure, here are 50 risks with the format for Airtable:

| Name of Risk | Explanation of What Can Go Wrong | Risk Severity (1-10) | Category |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Water damage from burst pipes | Burst pipes can cause water damage to the home's structure, floors, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 10 | Plumbing |
| Roof damage from storms | Severe weather, such as heavy rain, hail, or wind, can cause damage to the roof, leading to leaks and water damage | 9 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Electrical fires from faulty wiring | Faulty wiring can lead to electrical fires, which can cause severe damage to the home and personal belongings, and pose a significant risk to the occupants of the home | 9 | Electrical |
| Water damage from leaky roof | A leaky roof can cause water damage to the home's structure, floors, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 9 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Fire damage from unattended cooking | Unattended cooking is a common cause of house fires, which can cause severe damage to the home and personal belongings, and pose a significant risk to the occupants of the home | 8 | Fire Prevention |
| Water damage from clogged gutters | Clogged gutters can cause water to overflow and damage the home's structure, walls, and foundation, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 8 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Foundation damage from soil erosion | Soil erosion around the foundation can cause it to shift or crack, leading to structural damage to the home | 8 | Landscaping and Drainage |
| Mold growth from water damage | Water damage can lead to mold growth, which can cause health problems for the occupants of the home, and be costly to remove | 8 | Plumbing |
| Carbon monoxide poisoning from faulty heating | Faulty heating systems can lead to carbon monoxide poisoning, which can be fatal for the occupants of the home | 8 | HVAC |
| Water damage from faulty appliances | Faulty appliances, such as washing machines or dishwashers, can cause water damage to the home's structure, floors, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 8 | Plumbing |
| Fire damage from electrical appliances | Electrical appliances, such as space heaters or clothes dryers, can cause house fires if they are not maintained or used properly, leading to severe damage to the home and personal belongings | 8 | Electrical |
| Pest infestations from poor home maintenance | Poor home maintenance, such as not sealing entry points or cleaning up food debris, can attract pests, such as rodents or insects, which can be costly to remove and cause damage to the home and personal belongings | 7 | Pest Control |
| Water damage from leaking windows | Leaking windows can cause water damage to the home's structure, walls, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements | 7 | Insulation and Weatherproofing |
| Fire damage from faulty wiring | Faulty wiring can cause electrical fires, which can cause severe damage to the home and personal belongings, and pose a significant risk to the occupants of the home | 7 | Electrical |
| Water damage from blocked drains | Blocked drains can cause water to overflow and damage the home's structure, walls, and personal belongings, leading to expensive repairs or replacements |  |  |
